data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
In the minute 3, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Michael Boxall for Minnesota drives towards goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the finish is unsuccessful.
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Daniel Vega.
San Jose's Daniel Vega is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for Minnesota close to the penalty box.
In the minute 8, Jair Marrufo awards San Jose a goal kick.
Free kick Minnesota.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Minnesota.
In the minute 9, San Jose have a goal kick.
Minnesota's Jan Gregus gets in a shot on goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for San Jose at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 12, Michael Boxall for Minnesota gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
Goal kick for Minnesota at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Minnesota to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
In the minute 19, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Goal! Minnesota have got their heads in front thanks to a Robin Lod strike.
That's a fine assist from Jose Aja.
In the minute 21, Goal! Minnesota extend their lead to 0-2 through Jacori Hayes.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick Minnesota.
San Jose drive upfield and Cristian Espinoza gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Minnesota defender.
Vako Qazaishvili of San Jose smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 28, San Jose have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Jair Marrufo signals a San Jose throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Can Minnesota capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Jose's half?
Throw-in for Minnesota at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 33, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to San Jose.
Vako Qazaishvili of San Jose gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jair Marrufo awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Throw-in San Jose.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
In the minute 37, San Jose have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for San Jose, close to Minnesota's area.
San Jose pushes forward through Judson, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jan Gregus gets his shot on target but fails to score for Minnesota.
Minnesota needs to be cautious. San Jose have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 41, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Judson (San Jose) gets a yellow card.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
In the minute 43, San Jose's Magnus Eriksson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jair Marrufo awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
In the minute 45, Minnesota have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
In Orlando Minnesota drive forward through Jacori Hayes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 45, Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for San Jose, close to Minnesota's area.
Free kick San Jose.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Important block from the Minnesota defence as Judson fires in a strike for San Jose.
Osvaldo Alonso gets his shot on target but fails to score for Minnesota.
Throw-in San Jose.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, San Jose have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
San Jose have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 50, Goal! San Jose now trail just 1-2 thanks to a Magnus Eriksson spot-kick.
Throw-in for San Jose at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
In the minute 52, Cristian Espinoza (San Jose) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
San Jose's Vako Qazaishvili attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Minnesota at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In Orlando San Jose attack through Vako Qazaishvili. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
In the minute 55, In Orlando San Jose drive forward through Magnus Eriksson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Goal! Luis Amarilla extends Minnesota's lead to 1-3.
In the minute 56, Great play from Robin Lod to set up the goal.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Matias Jesus Almeyda (San Jose) is making a third substitution, with Chris Wondolowski replacing Judson.
In the minute 60, San Jose make their first substitution with Carlos Fierro replacing Tommy Thompson.
Shea Salinas is on a sub for Nick Lima for San Jose.
In the minute 61, Minnesota's Jan Gregus breaks free at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
San Jose have a goal kick.
Adrian Heath is making the team's first substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Aaron Schoenfeld replacing Luis Amarilla.
In the minute 63, Jair Marrufo signals a Minnesota throw-in in San Jose's half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Andy Rios for San Jose has been booked by Jair Marrufo and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 66, Aaron Schoenfeld for Minnesota drives towards goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Minnesota's Aaron Schoenfeld gets his shot away but it misses the target.
San Jose have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Matias Jesus Almeyda is making the team's fifth substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Danny Hoesen replacing Andy Rios.
Matias Jesus Almeyda (San Jose) is making a fourth substitution, with Jack Skahan replacing Magnus Eriksson.
Marlon Hairston is replacing Jacori Hayes for Minnesota at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 69, Jair Marrufo signals a San Jose throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Minnesota's Hassani Dotson breaks free at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jair Marrufo awards San Jose a goal kick.
In the minute 73, San Jose are pushing forward but Vako Qazaishvili's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Goal kick for San Jose at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 74, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to San Jose just outside Minnesota's area.
San Jose are coming forward and Oswaldo Alanis gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Raheem Edwards is on a sub for Robin Lod for Minnesota.
Minnesota needs to be cautious. San Jose have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 79, Vako Qazaishvili for San Jose gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Minnesota at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Danny Hoesen's header is off-target for San Jose.
In the minute 81, Jair Marrufo awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Minnesota push upfield but Jair Marrufo quickly pulls them for offside.
In Orlando Minnesota attack through Marlon Hairston. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Minnesota.
In the minute 85, Minnesota's Aaron Schoenfeld gets in a shot on goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Jackson Yueill (San Jose) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
It's now 1-4 in Orlando as Marlon Hairston scores for Minnesota.
In the minute 86, Osvaldo Alonso instrumental with a fine assist.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
San Jose will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Minnesota.
In the minute 88, Minnesota are in shooting range from this free kick.
Chris Wondolowski (San Jose) has received a first yellow card.
Minnesota apply pressure at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Jan Gregus but the strike hits the bar!
In the minute 89, San Jose have a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Orlando San Jose attack through Vako Qazaishvili. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Minnesota at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Throw-in for San Jose at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Minnesota to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Minnesota.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-4.
